Lucas Amorim

Lucas Amorim

Hi, my name is Lucas Amorim and I’m a Hacker based out of Vancouver, Canada.

My interest in computers started in 2003, when I was 15 years old and I found Linux for the first time.

I started my Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science in 2007. That same year I also began my first job in IT as a sysadmin/security analyst and released my first open source tool: gtool.

Since then, I have been working as a Software/AppSec Engineer.

  • CVE-2020-8813 - Rails 5.0.1 - Remote Code Execution
